tool_description: Get all NFTs owned by an address at scale
name: NFTs by address
title: NFTs by address

api_list.name: getNFTs_byaddress
api_list.description: Gets all NFTs currently owned by a given address. Unlimited, results display in 100s.

required_parameters.name: owner
required_parameters.description: Input the address for NFT owner and scrape their NFTs.

optional_parameters.name: pageKey
optional_parameters.description: To pull subsequent requests. Note: it expires after 10 minutes
